results.title: Metformin protects the heart against chronic intermittent hypoxia through AMPK-dependent phosphorylation of HIF-1alpha.
results.text_hl: Our data suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could be considered as a cardioprotective drug in @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Apnea_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020181 @@@OSA@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ independently of their metabolic status.

citations.NLM: Moulin S, Blachot-Minassian B, Kneppers A, Thomas A, Paradis S, Bultot L, Arnaud C, Pépin JL, Bertrand L, Mounier R, Belaidi E. results.title: Effect of lifestyle changes on liver enzymes, triglycerides, sex hormones, and daytime sleepiness in polycystic ovarian syndrome women with obstructive sleep apnea and fatty liver - a randomized controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Conclusions: Adding eight weeks of free-walking exercise to LCD and administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ resulted in significantly greater improvements in @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ than LCD and administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alone in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Non_alcoholic_Fatty_Liver_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D065626 @@@NAFLD@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Apnea_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020181 @@@OSA@@@.

citations.NLM: Ali Ismail AM, Mousa NMA, Elgendy SKM, Al-Emrany AM, Saber OSA, Elhakk SMA, Mohamed D, Ghaleb HAM. Effect of lifestyle changes on liver enzymes, triglycerides, sex hormones, and daytime sleepiness in polycystic ovarian syndrome women with obstructive sleep apnea and fatty liver - a randomized controlled trial. results.title: Effect of dapagliflozin on obstructive sleep apnea in patients with type 2 diabetes: a preliminary study
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_dapagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C529054 @@@Dapagliflozin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can effectively reduce the body weight of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Apnea_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020181 @@@OSAHS@@@.

results.title: Metformin: Mechanisms in Human Obesity and Weight Loss.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is also being explored in the management of @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@'s sequelae such as @DISEASE_Fatty_Liver @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@hepatic steatosis@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Apnea_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020181 @@@obstructive sleep apnea@@@, and @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@osteoarthritis@@@.
